ygData.subject: Re: Guk expedition , part II
ygData.msgSnippet: Not only damask, gossimer too, but its at the lower level tho i think. So about the expedition we meet in east commons at 9pm at the tunnel entrance to North
ygData.messageBody:
Not only damask, gossimer too, but its at the lower level tho i think.
So about the expedition we meet in east commons at 9pm at the tunnel
entrance to North Ro and make our way to guk tonight? Please add your name
if yer coming

Leshrec - Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 18, 1999 9:30 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition , part II


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Damask aromor? *sallow saliver* Yummy ;) Me me!
>

wrote:

and

hehe

>> >>From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>> >>
>> >>Thx u Serp and Lesh for the feedback.
>> >>
>> >>LOL, Im more Greedy than Crazy.. hmmmm i think both..A crazy greedy
monk.
>> >>
>> >>Let's hit Guk than.
>> >>
>> >>There's my proposal. Please let me have your ideas and most imporatnt
of
>> >>all, WHEN and how long u can play and stay B4 log-out.
>> >>
>> >>1) We Meet at Oasis, 1st Pillar make our way to Innoulthe Swamp on
Friday
>> >>evening 9:00 PM.
>> >>2) Look around and hunt a bit if still got time
>> >>3) Saturday Morning: 9:00AM , go GUK and Kick ass!.
>> >>
>> >>Your ideas and suggestion pls, some of u have the experiment at Guk and
>> >>swamp, pls share.
>> >>
>> >>So far, the following ppl r interested, except timing not confirm.
>> >>1) Leshrec-Wiz
>> >>2) Garren- Pal
>> >>3) Trifrost-Shaman
>> >>4) Ziltus-Wiz
>> >>5) Yiyang-Monk
>> >>
>> >>Let's confirm this b4 Friday evening tommorrow. if last min, some of u
>> cant
>> >>make it (overtime etc) ,np. we will see how and decide if we can still
>> >>continue, BUT the expedition is ON .
>> >>
>> >>Yiyang'ing to Guk
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>-----Original Message-----

>> >>To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

>> >>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition ??
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>>From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>> >>>

it?
>> >I
>> >>>thought it loads in Najena. Anyways, I really need woven stuff there
so
>> >I'm
>> >>>up for it ) Actually, we can camp at an area in GUK when the stuff
there
>> >is
>> >>>about 16-20. Knights and warriors there and sometimes, shamans and
witch
>> >>>doctors. btw, theres a woven grass bracer which loads there which is
>> quite
>> >>>good. Forgot the stats, but i saw it selling for about 20pp. That
named
>> >npc
>> >>>frog also goes around occasionally and we should be able to take him
on.
>> >>>
>> >>>-----Original Message-----
>> >>>From: Alex <leealex@...>
>> >>>To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

>> >>>>From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>> >>>>
>> >>>>I have been postponing the trip to Guk for the foloowing selfish
reasons
>> >>:P
>> >>>>
>> >>>>1) The lower guk has very mean monsters(2oth-30th lvl) that carries
nice
>> >>>>stuff: There my shopping list:
>> >>>>a)collar of undead protection, 5hp,7 vs disease and poison,
>> >>>>b)The Jorneyman boots-slightly slower than SOW, just click on it and
>> >>>>run.-Very nice
>> >>>>c) Silverplate plate bracers-+ 7hp (upperguk)
>> >>>>d) Azure sleeves +12hp weight only 0.4 (lower guk)
>> >>>>e) Kobold boots
>> >>>>f) mesh , mesh mesh
>> >>>>and the animated Hand that gives out ????
>> >>>>
>> >>>>2) My lvl is only 17th , cant hit the lower guk yet. I can hit the
upper
>> >>>guk
>> >>>>Gaz, taz warriors for the mesh but the next time i go back to lower
guk,
>> >>my
>> >>>>factions with them is so bad that any frogglock and Kolbold that will
>> KOS
>> >>>me
>> >>>>onsight. I hope to hit 20+ lvl go striagth into lower guk and storm
the
>> >>>>buggers.
>> >>>>
>> >>>>3) Is so difficult to gather a group at the FIX day and time to hunt
>> for
>> >>>at
>> >>>>least 3-4 hrs, camp there and go back in again at a later
time-Together
>> >>and
>> >>>>so on. It IS very important to be in Group.
>> >>>>
>> >>>>There my suggested list of personal in the Guk group
>> >>>>a) at least 1 monk
>> >>>>b) at least 1 Paladin
>> >>>>c) 1 Shaman
>> >>>>d) 1 Wiz
>> >>>>c) 1 rogue
>> >>>>d) anyone/any char
>> >>>>
>> >>>>Monk and paladin to tank, shaman to hit and buff, wiz to ROOT and
>> >>hit -this
>> >>>>4 char r the mininum for a group. Xp is NOt the purpose. It the
Goodies
>> >we
>> >>>>all want. i say if u r below lvl 10th also can come for the
adventure,
>> >>>thats
>> >>>>if u dont mind the xp.
>> >>>>Garren is now 18th Pal
>> >>>>Leshrec is 17th Wiz, can made 18th by weekend, np
>> >>>>Yiyang 17th Monk, may nit make 18th by weekend- got problem :P
>> >>>>Trifrost 14th Shaman, can make 15th by weekend, np
>> >>>>
>> >>>>Some of u are experience in Guk eg, Garren ,Sereph and Leshrec, etc ,
>> >your
>> >>>>comments pls.
>> >>>>
>> >>>>Please add and correct on the above. Im open for the Expedition to
Guk.
>> >>>>Today is Thursday. Wanna meets on Saturday mornning?? I hve to log
at
>> >>>>1:00pm and be back at 8:pm. suggestion please.
>> >>>>
>> >>>>Yiyang of Innoruuk
>> >>>>
